Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 24 Sep 2018Take up a bank loan to fund your degree first. Save up as much as possible during NS and try to work part time (tuition etc.) during your free time when pursuing your degree. Then try to pay off your study loan as soon as possible to reduce the amount of interest payable. The best solution would be to pay in full before graduation as it'll still be interest free since it only kicks in after you graduate. Alternatively, you can ask your parents to help you pay first and you'll repay them every month etc.0 comments0
